title: Esa backlog result
content:
I have got an F grade in nas ,3rd sem ece. I thought ill get d grade atleast cus my internal marks are above 30,tho esa was harder for me  
Im gonna apply for reval, would ece teachers actually consider students to atleast get an e grade or just let u fail? or should i just give up and write backlog exam cus most ppl say grades dont increase ...

comments.body:
Depends on how well you did your ESA ! If you are expecting above 20 you'll get E   
ECE Teachers won't show mercy if you don't deserve
They will let u fail if u haven't written enough
Apply for reval even if you have slightest doubt.
Can you elaborate which subject and which campus u r from???

In my opinion, this seems nearly impossible
It should be very easy to get 20 out of 100 in an ESA 
I suggest u apply for reviewing your ESA paper for that subject, if u feel u deserve better then talk to your subject teacher about it and try to mail the COE via the teacher , and maybe apply for re-evaluation..since..thatâ€™s just the best u can do at this point 
Hope this helps :)
network analysis and synthesis ,ece and im from rr campus
